title: Stroke Patient and Family Care Education Program: Strengthening Competencies of Community Health Workers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Educational design reflecting limited rehabilitation service environments in rural South Africa, requiring accessibility assurance through smartphone-based mobile learning.

learning_goals: Learners can perform five practical skills for supporting activities of daily living (ADL) in stroke patients
Learners can explain at least three psychological support strategies for stroke survivors and their families
Learners can practice developing care plans utilizing community resources (e.g., rehabilitation centers, support groups)
Learners can propose solutions to field problems by applying collaborative inquiry (CI) methodology

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
